modName: Dark Brotherhood Chest Armor Retexture Lore Friendly (Male)
summary: I retextured the male dark brotherhood chest piece because I felt it was incomplete.  Plus it doesn't look like the dark elves armor on the loading screen.
descriptionHtml:
This is just one file which is my current 1.3!!!!!!!!!!!!! version of the dark brother hood chest armor retextured. It basically just adds more straps to complete the overall look, which I felt was lacking by comparison of the dark elf on the loading screen.

The picture has the mod by SUNDRACO; BROTHERHOOD MASK FOR MAN AND MER main mod, and the linwes optional file in the same file section as the mod aswell. Along with DSpSoB; on back optional file aswell

-Brotherhood Mask for Man and Mer - male by Sundracon
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2445

DSpSoB - Dual Sheath plus Shields on Back by DarkPhoenix
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17746
author: WesYes
